title: Hiram (name)
text: Hiram (<a href="Phoenician%20language">Phoenician</a> "benevolent brother", <a href="Hebrew%20language">Hebrew</a> חִירָם "high-born", <a href="Standard%20Hebrew">Standard Hebrew</a> Ḥiram, <a href="Tiberian%20Hebrew">Tiberian Hebrew</a> Ḥîrām) is a <a href="Bible">biblical</a> given name referring to <a href="Phoenicia">Phoenicia</a>n kings.
